content.title: filter
content.shortContent: Selects a subset of items from array and returns it as a new array.

content.title: currency
content.shortContent: Formats a number as a currency (ie $1,234.56). When no currency symbol is provided, default symbol for current locale is used.

content.title: date
content.shortContent: Formats date to a string based on the requested format.

content.title: json
content.shortContent: Allows you to convert a JavaScript object into JSON string.

content.title: limitTo
content.shortContent: Creates a new array or string containing only a specified number of elements. The elements are taken from either the beginning or the end of the source array, string or number, as specified by the value and sign (positive or negative) of limit. If a number is used as input, it is converted to a string.

content.title: orderBy
content.shortContent: Orders a specified array by the expression predicate. It is ordered alphabetically for strings and numerically for numbers. Note: if you notice numbers are not being sorted as expected, make sure they are actually being saved as numbers and not strings.
